证据片段: Two surface finishing techniques were applied during manufacture of the cladding discussed in this paper. Approximately equal numbers of pins were finished by: ( a ) belt-grinding, and ( b ) acid pickling followed by autoclaving at 400°C to give a 1 to 2-μm oxide layer.
